title: I can not find photos I have saved from messenger. It sends them to "saved", but in the heck is that? they are not in photos.
content: I can't find photo's that I have tried to save to my pixil 2.  I want to send that photo to an email address.  But... I cant find it anywhere.  Not in photos. it has been downloaded to something called.. "saved".  Saved to what? and how can I find it.  all I want to do to send a messenger photo to an email address.   help!!!!!!!!!!!!
